page.title: 04A WEEKEND'S LEISURE
page.content: {Friday}I come home from school and go to the Mud Hill while mum and dad are at work. After dinner,at five o'clock, we play football while mum reads the paper and goes to the pub.At nine o'clock we watch t.v till ten o'clock and then we go to bed. {Saturday}morning I get up and have breakfast then play snooker until dinner time.After dinner I watch my dad play cricket while mum is at work. At seven o'clock I go to the pub with mum and dad until ten o'clock,then I go to bed. {Sunday}morning I get up and have breakfast and get ready to play cricket for the under fifteens. After winning cricket we have dinner and then we go for a walk through the park for the afternoon.Then we go home and have tea then I watch T.V. and go to bed.
